# Ensemble Model with Redistricting

```{r}
redist <- read_csv("redist_results.csv")
overlap <- read_csv("pop_overlap_vtd_estimates.csv")
```

```{r}
summed_redist <- redist %>%
  drop_na() %>%
  group_by(state, district) %>%
  summarize(dem_2p_avg = sum(dem_2p, na.rm = TRUE)/n())
```

```{r}
histogram(summed_redist$dem_2p_avg)
```
